example.parse: (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS حذر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP من) (SBAR (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC حكومة) (NP (NOUN_PROP قرضاي))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تمتلك) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المال) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_ACC الكافي)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN دفع) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رواتب) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN موظفي) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شهر) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_INDEF_GEN آب)))))))
